ipConfig.name: IP Address
ipConfig.hint: The address of the python server that is connected to the arduino.

seatPositions.name: Seat positions (optional)
seatPositions.hint: Enter the names of the players separated by commas, in the order they are seated. (If left blank, the player order in Foundry will be used.)

messages.playerNotFound: Player ${playerName} not found in seat position configuration.
